title: The Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale Is Almost Over—40 Luxe-Looking Items to Shop While You Still Can
text: Now that the holiday season has come to a close (sigh), I'm officially ready to get my 2025 wardrobe into gear. Huzzah! I'm already adding elevated, easy, and chic items to my cart from Nordstrom's epic Half-Yearly Sale, which is currently offering up to 60% off some of my favorite brands and styles right now. If you haven't managed to shop the massive sale yet, now is the perfect time to get your hands on a whole host of expensive-looking basics, staple jeans, chic shoes, and luxurious-looking items that will instantly elevate your wardrobe. Below, I'm sharing my must-have edit of chic and elegant pieces you don't want to miss. A word of advice: Don't sleep on it. The sale ends on January 6, so add these pieces to your cart while you still can! Nordstrom V-Neck Cashmere Sweater AG Kora High Waist Wide Leg Jeans White jeans you can style with sweaters right now and tank tops later in the year. Reformation Luell Long Sleeve Merino Wool Minidress The perfect casual dress for when you don't know what to wear. MANGO Faux Leather Bowling Bag The handbag silhouette fashion people are loving right now. MANGO Wool Blend Zip Jacket A jacket that is as versatile as it is chic. Marc Fisher Ubet Ballet Flat You can't go wrong with a chic pair of ballet flats. Topshop Cinch Wide Leg Jeans Nordstrom High Low Mock Neck Fisherman Sweater RUE SOPHIE Jeriel High Waist Straight Leg Pants Trousers you can wear year-round. Nordstrom Arazio Kitten Heel Bootie The perfect black ankle boots *do* exist. MANGO Angela Water Repellent Trench Coat A chic trench coat is always a good investment. MANGO Eliote Crop Cardigan A striped cardi you can wear now through summer. Ana Luisa Gold Pendant Necklace Amp up your basics with this gorgeous pendant necklace. Nordstrom Crewneck Cashmere Sweater The cashmere sweater our editors love. PAIGE Sasha Wide Leg Jeans Polished jeans you can dress up or down. Steve Madden Peony Slingback Pointed Toe Pump Wear with knee-high boots or pumps for a chic winter look. Nordstrom Relaxed Fit Blazer MANGO Leather Top Handle Bag This could pass for designer. Reformation Layla Print Maxi Skirt Lean into the leopard-print trend. Nordstrom Wool & Cashmere Turtleneck Sweater A versatile color that will go with everything. MANGO Contrast Faux Leather Trim Faux Fur Toggle Coat Run, don't walk—Mango's viral shearling coat is on sale. Reformation Brooklyn Organic Cotton Sweater It's not often Ref items go on sale. French Connection Textured Button Front Miniskirt I love the idea of styling this luxe miniskirt with knee-high boots and tights right now and ballet flats come spring. Topshop Cable Stitch Cardigan The cute cardi you'll reach for on repeat. Style with a sweater and pointed-toe kitten heels. st. Moran Julien Freshwater Pearl Toggle Necklace A string of pearls will always make your outfit look posh. LIONESS Workwear Water Repellent Cotton Jacket My love for barn jackets continues. MANGO Pleated Wide Leg Pants There are so many great colors to style these espresso-brown trousers with. Style with your favorite midi dress. Reformation Catalina Button Front Knit Organic Cotton Minidress Mulberry Pimlico Super Lux Leather Shoulder Bag A designer bag everyone will ogle over. Veronica Beard Liff Wool Blend Cutaway Vest From boardroom to bar in style. I tried these on recently, and they fit and drape beautifully. Style with jeans, sweats, skirts—you name it. Topshop Cinch Back Low Rise Wide Leg Jeans Cool jeans for under $60. Barbour Fleur Quilted Jacket For my fellow Barbour devotees. MOTHER The Ditcher Zip Flood Straight Leg Jeans The perfect straight-leg silhouette. Splendid X Cella Jane Double Breasted Wool Blend Coat Ana Luisa Eden Small Hoop Earrings Elevate your outfit in an instant.
html:
Now that the holiday season has come to a close (sigh), I'm officially ready to get my 2025 wardrobe into gear. Huzzah! I'm already adding elevated, easy, and chic items to my cart from Nordstrom's epic Half-Yearly Sale, which is currently offering up to 60% off some of my favorite brands and styles right now. If you haven't managed to shop the massive sale yet, now is the perfect time to get your hands on a whole host of expensive-looking basics, staple jeans, chic shoes, and luxurious-looking items that will instantly elevate your wardrobe. Below, I'm sharing my must-have edit of chic and elegant pieces you don't want to miss. A word of advice: Don't sleep on it. The sale ends on January 6, so add these pieces to your cart while you still can!

Nordstrom

V-Neck Cashmere Sweater

AG

Kora High Waist Wide Leg Jeans

White jeans you can style with sweaters right now and tank tops later in the year.

Reformation

Luell Long Sleeve Merino Wool Minidress

The perfect casual dress for when you don't know what to wear.

MANGO

Faux Leather Bowling Bag

The handbag silhouette fashion people are loving right now.

MANGO

Wool Blend Zip Jacket

A jacket that is as versatile as it is chic.

Marc Fisher

Ubet Ballet Flat

You can't go wrong with a chic pair of ballet flats.

Topshop

Cinch Wide Leg Jeans

Nordstrom

High Low Mock Neck Fisherman Sweater

RUE SOPHIE

Jeriel High Waist Straight Leg Pants

Trousers you can wear year-round.

Nordstrom

Arazio Kitten Heel Bootie

The perfect black ankle boots *do* exist.

MANGO

Angela Water Repellent Trench Coat

A chic trench coat is always a good investment.

MANGO

Eliote Crop Cardigan

A striped cardi you can wear now through summer.

Ana Luisa

Gold Pendant Necklace

Amp up your basics with this gorgeous pendant necklace.

Nordstrom

Crewneck Cashmere Sweater

The cashmere sweater our editors love.

PAIGE

Sasha Wide Leg Jeans

Polished jeans you can dress up or down.

Steve Madden

Peony Slingback Pointed Toe Pump

Wear with knee-high boots or pumps for a chic winter look.

Nordstrom

Relaxed Fit Blazer

MANGO

Leather Top Handle Bag

This could pass for designer.

Reformation

Layla Print Maxi Skirt

Lean into the leopard-print trend.

Nordstrom

Wool & Cashmere Turtleneck Sweater

A versatile color that will go with everything.

MANGO

Contrast Faux Leather Trim Faux Fur Toggle Coat

Run, don't walk—Mango's viral shearling coat is on sale.

Reformation

Brooklyn Organic Cotton Sweater

It's not often Ref items go on sale.

French Connection

Textured Button Front Miniskirt

I love the idea of styling this luxe miniskirt with knee-high boots and tights right now and ballet flats come spring.

Topshop

Cable Stitch Cardigan

The cute cardi you'll reach for on repeat.

Style with a sweater and pointed-toe kitten heels.

st. Moran

Julien Freshwater Pearl Toggle Necklace

A string of pearls will always make your outfit look posh.

LIONESS

Workwear Water Repellent Cotton Jacket

My love for barn jackets continues.

MANGO

Pleated Wide Leg Pants

There are so many great colors to style these espresso-brown trousers with.

Style with your favorite midi dress.

Reformation

Catalina Button Front Knit Organic Cotton Minidress

Mulberry

Pimlico Super Lux Leather Shoulder Bag

A designer bag everyone will ogle over.

Veronica Beard

Liff Wool Blend Cutaway Vest

From boardroom to bar in style.

I tried these on recently, and they fit and drape beautifully.

Style with jeans, sweats, skirts—you name it.

Topshop

Cinch Back Low Rise Wide Leg Jeans

Cool jeans for under $60.

Barbour

Fleur Quilted Jacket

For my fellow Barbour devotees.

MOTHER

The Ditcher Zip Flood Straight Leg Jeans

The perfect straight-leg silhouette.

Splendid X Cella Jane

Double Breasted Wool Blend Coat

Ana Luisa

Eden Small Hoop Earrings

Elevate your outfit in an instant.
